AppDescripLong: We use different sources of data to notify you of active fires in your areas of interest
o regístrate con un correo: or Sign Up with an Email Address
Introduce tu correo abajo para recibir u: Enter your email address below to receive a link to reset your password.
Necesito tu contraseña si la quieres cam: Need your current password if changing.
Necesito tu nueva contraseña si la quier: Need your new password if changing.
verifyEmail: Hey friend! Can you verify your email address ({{email}}) for us?
Mmmm, tus contraseñas no coinciden. Inté: Hmm, your passwords don't match. Try again
Para resetear tu contraseña, introduce u: To reset your password, enter a new one below. You will be logged in with your new password.
Imágenes capturadas por los satélites de: Images captured by NASA satellites show the smoke of large fires spreading over the Pacific Ocean. Fire activity is outlined in red.
Has iniciado sesión con {{service}} usan: You're logged in with {{service}} using the email address {{email}}.
Utilizamos cookies para asegurar un mejo: We use cookies to ensure a better use of our website. If you continue browsing, we consider that you accept their use
noActiveFireInMapCount: There are no active fires in this area of the map. <1><0>{{countTotal}}</0></1> active fires worldwide.
activeFireInMapCount: Marked in red <1><0>{{count,number}}</0></1> active fires. <3><0>{{countTotal,number}} </0></3> active fires worldwide.
activeNeigFireInMapCount: In Orange, the fires recently reported by our users.
Resaltar en verde el área vigilada por n: The area monitored by our users is highlighted in green
Resaltar los fuegos con un marcador: Highlight the fires with a marker
mapPrivacy: <0>In order to preserve the privacy of our users, the reflected data are randomly altered and are only indicative.</0>
Suscribirme a fuegos en este radio: Subscribe to fires in this radio
Indícanos la posición de la zona a vigil: Tell us the position of the area to be monitored (eg your town, a street, etc.):
También puedes seleccionar la zona en el: You can also select the area on the map by dragging the orange pointer.
¿A que distancia a la redonda quieres re: At what distance around you want to receive fire notifications?
Suscripciones a alertas de fuegos en zon: Subscriptions to alerts for fires in areas of my interest
En verde, áreas de las que recibirás ale: In green, areas from which you will receive fire alerts
Pulsa aquí para borrar la zona: Click here to remove the area
Los fuegos activos se actualizan en tiem: Fires are updated in near real-time.
Usa nuestro bot de Telegram para estar a: Use our Telegram bot to be aware of the fires in your area
support-us-home: We are developing our tools for other devices. You can <1>help make it possible.</1>
dev-with-us-home: All of our work is <1>free/open software</1>. <3>Translators</3> and <5>developers always welcome</5>.
También puedes seguirnos en la web: You can also follow us on the web
Dejarás de recibir notificaciones de fue: Are you sure you want to stop getting notifications of fires in this area?
Sobre los datos y imágenes usados: About the data and images used
No estás suscrito a fuegos en ninguna zo: You are not subscribed to fires in any area
Recibe alertas de fuegos en esa zona: Get alerts of fires in that area
Alerta cuando hay un fuego: Alert when there is a fire
Siempre alerta a los fuegos en nuestro v: Always alert to the fires in our neighborhood
Información adicional sobre fuego detect: Additional information about fire detected in {{where}} on {{when}}
Additional information about fire detected on {{when}}
Puedes añadir un comentario si tienes in: You can add a comment if you have additional information about this fire.
si conoces esta zona y cómo acceder al f: If you know the area and how to access the fire (this can be helpful to turn off if still active or to investigate in the future)
si conoces el motivo por el que comenzó: if you know the reason why the fire started
si quieres denunciar algún tipo de ilega: if you want to denounce some kind of illegality, even anonymously
Haga zoom en una zona de su interés si q: Zoom into an area of your interest if you want that fires to be updated in real time.
Recibe nuestras notificaciones de fuegos: Receive our fire notifications by mail or in your browser
Fuego notificado por uno de nuestros usu: Fire reported by one of our users <1></1>
No recibirás notificaciones de fuegos en: You will not receive notifications of fires in this device, only by email
termsAccept: I accept the <1>conditions of service</1> of this site
En verde, las zonas vigiladas por nuestr: In green, the areas monitored by our users currently
CO2emisions: Did you know that wildfires <1>produce as much CO² as cars</1> and <3>about ⅕ of all our carbon emissions</3>?
Ayúdanos a combatir el cambio climático: Help us fight climate change and protect the environment
Fuego en La Tuna, Los Ángeles, Estados U: La Tuna fire, LA, United States, September 2017
Polución en la ciudad de Almaty, Kazakhs: Smog over Almaty city, Kazakhstan, January 2014
general-error-description: We are investigating the problem, try again in a while
Tomamos nota, ¡gracias por colaborar!: We take note, thanks for collaborating!
Indícanos de que tipo de fuego se trata: Tell us what kind of fire it is and help us improve our notifications:
Regístrate o inicia sesión para aportar: Sign up or login to provide information about this fire
Fuegos activos en el mundo actualizados: Active fires in the world updated in real time
Zonas vigiladas por nuestros usuari@s ac: Areas currently monitored by our users
Puedes participar en las traducciones: You can help with the translations
Desconectado del servidor, reconectando: Disconnected from server, trying to reconnect in %delay%s.
Disconnected from server, trying to reconnect...
Parece que este fuego no es un fuego for: It seems that this is not a forest fire.
¿Vecindarios vigilando y combatiendo fue: Neighborhoods monitoring and fighting fires? What is all this about?
noActiveNeigFireInMap: There are no fires recently reported by our users in this area.
Escribe un lugar para centrar el mapa: Write a place to center the map
geo-not-perms-error: Upppps: it seems we do not have permission to know your location
geo-not-avail-error: Upppps: it seems your location is not available
geo-not-timeout-error: Upppps: Your device is taking too long to know your location
Estás subscrito a una zona muy grande: You are subscribed to a very large area
on-already-subscribed: Upppps: You have already subscribed to that zone before
Nota: Las nubes pueden entorpecer la det: Note: Cloud cover might obscure active fire detections.
Hay más información sobre un fuego: There is more information about a fire
